meanings.definition: An event, especially a sports game, that is canceled due to rain.
meanings.sent1: The baseball team was disappointed when the rainouts forced them to reschedule their game.
meanings.sent2: The soccer match was called off because of the rainouts.
meanings.sent3: The rainouts turned the outdoor concert into an indoor dance party!
meanings.sent4: The rainouts were like a sudden curtain closing on the eagerly awaited game.
meanings.sent5: The rainouts left a trail of wet disappointment in their wake.

meanings.definition: The act of canceling an event, especially a sports game, due to rain.
meanings.sent1: The coach's decision to announce the rainouts early saved the players from unnecessary waiting.
meanings.sent2: The rainouts led to a series of rescheduled matches for the tennis tournament.
meanings.sent3: The rainouts made the sports fans do a rain dance to try to stop the downpour!
meanings.sent4: The rainouts felt like a sudden change of plans in the middle of a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The rainouts poured disappointment on the excited fans.
